data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 2, Freiburg push forward at Schwarzwald-Stadion and Ermedin Demirovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined M´gladbach defence.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 5, Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of M´gladbach.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Freiburg are pushing forward but Keven Schlotterbeck's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Freiburg.
In the minute 10, Christian Gunter of Freiburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 11, Tobias Stieler awards the away team a throw-in.
In Freiburg, Alassane Plea of M´gladbach is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Throw-in high up the field for M´gladbach in Freiburg.
In Freiburg Freiburg drive forward through Jonathan Schmid. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 16, Freiburg's Jonathan Schmid breaks free at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
Goal kick for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 18, Play has been interrupted briefly in Freiburg to check on Matthias Ginter, who is grimacing with pain.
M´gladbach’s Matthias Ginter is on his feet again at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Can Freiburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside M´gladbach's half?
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Baptiste Santamaria for Freiburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 21, Tobias Stieler awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Breel Embolo puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 25, Free kick M´gladbach.
At Schwarzwald-Stadion, Keven Schlotterbeck has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Tobias Stieler signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In the minute 26, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Freiburg's Ermedin Demirovic is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 28, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Throw-in for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 30, Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Freiburg pushes forward through Vincenzo Grifo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Philipp Lienhart (Freiburg) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Great play from Baptiste Santamaria to set up the goal.
In the minute 33, Tobias Stieler signals a Freiburg throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Freiburg's Keven Schlotterbeck attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 34, Tobias Stieler awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Freiburg.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
Tobias Stieler signals a throw-in for M´gladbach, close to Freiburg's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 39, Freiburg's Ermedin Demirovic goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
M´gladbach attack but Breel Embolo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Freiburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Florian Neuhaus (M´gladbach) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
An attacking Freiburg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
M´gladbach are whistled for offside.
In the minute 48, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Vincenzo Grifo converts the penalty to give Freiburg a 2-1 lead.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 50, Alassane Plea levels the score at 2-2.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
M´gladbach have a dangerous throw-in.
Tobias Stieler awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Laszlo Benes is on a sub for Denis Zakaria for M´gladbach.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Freiburg.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
In the minute 55, M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
M´gladbach's Lars Stindl gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 59, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Freiburg.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Freiburg.
In the minute 62, Freiburg have a goal kick.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Freiburg.
In the minute 64, In Freiburg Freiburg attack through Christian Gunter. The finish is off target, however.
Tobias Stieler awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Valentino Lazaro is replacing Stefan Lainer for M´gladbach at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 65, Marcus Thuram is replacing Hannes Wolf for the away team.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Freiburg drive upfield and Ermedin Demirovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
Freiburg are coming forward and Baptiste Santamaria gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for M´gladbach at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 72, Laszlo Benes (M´gladbach) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Freiburg.
The home team replace Lucas Holer with Roland Sallai.
Freiburg make their second substitution with Nils Petersen replacing Ermedin Demirovic.
In the minute 75, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Alassane Plea (M´gladbach) has received a yellow card from Tobias Stieler.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for M´gladbach at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Vincenzo Grifo hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Freiburg!
Tobias Stieler awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, Free kick Freiburg.
The away team replace Alassane Plea with Patrick Herrmann.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
Guus Til is on a sub for Vincenzo Grifo for Freiburg.
M´gladbach's Patrick Herrmann gets in a shot on goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, In Freiburg Freiburg attack through Nils Petersen. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Florian Neuhaus of M´gladbach smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Christian Gunter gets his shot on target but fails to score for Freiburg.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tobias Stieler awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
In the minute 89, In Freiburg, Freiburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
M´gladbach are coming forward and Patrick Herrmann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Tobias Stieler awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
